content: Wejo’s real-time traffic intelligence or RTTI, Wejo RTTI is our new revolutionary traffic management product that we launched recently. Wejo RTTI provides a holistic view on traffic conditions and safety conditions on the road to predict faster and safer their cruising, reinforcing by our proprietary solutions that are utilized by leaders in industry to demonstrate the capabilities of traffic intelligence.
